disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 7 February to end of Monday 7 February GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: A clear bright start to Monday, becoming cloudy.<br/><br/>A 'clean' Atlantic westerly or south westerly breeze, with good dispersion of any local pollution, is forecast.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday. GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday.
